title: Bilawal thanks Germany for 60 million euros aid for flood victims
content:
BERLIN, Oct 7 (APP):Minister for Foreign Affairs Bilawal Bhutto Zardari while thanking the German government for its assistance for flood affectees in Pakistan, Friday said the total amount of aid from Germany had reached 60 million euros.
Talking to media, he said he held a positive meeting with the German Foreign Minister and they discussed matters related to climate change, floods in Pakistan and green energy.
Later, the foreign minister visited the Pakistani embassy in Berlin and inaugurated the digital tourism center.He appreciated the step to promote the heritage and tourist spots of Pakistan through augmented and virtual reality.The chief executive officer of Digital Munich Arslan Minhas briefed the minster about the project.
